name: Rodger Ramrod
description: "Rodger Ramrod - Adventures on NONAZ.COM" is an action game with a few twists. You play our hero, Rodger, who is enjoying the company of his girlfriend, when she is kidnapped by the forces of evil just before he crosses the finish line. Armed with only the weapons provided at birth, you must enter a realm of perversion, depravity, and smut. You must solve puzzles and defeat your enemies. But most of all, you must rescue your lady-love or be forever doomed to life with Mary Palm and her five sisters.
